      • removeOutliersByLocation

        protected void removeOutliersByLocation(java.util.List<FeatureComparisonStat> compStats)
        NOTE: this should only be used on a small area because it assumes that rotation is negligible within region compared here. It's assumed that it's used on a blob of the size within min and max ranges passed from BlobScaleFinderWrapper.
        Parameters:
        compStats -
